.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit StringComparer extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1<string>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1<string>, class System.Collections.IComparer, class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer
Public MustInherit Class StringComparer Implements IComparer, IComparer(Of String), IEqualityComparer, IEqualityComparer(Of String)

public ref class StringComparer abstract : System::Collections::Generic::IComparer<System::String ^>, System::Collections::Generic::IEqualityComparer<System::String ^>, System::Collections::IComparer, System::Collections::IEqualityComparer
type StringComparer = class interface IComparer interface IEqualityComparer interface IComparer<string> interface IEqualityComparer<string>

summary.span: Represents a string comparison operation that uses specific case and culture-based or ordinal comparison rules.

span.span: Represents a string comparison operation that uses specific case and culture-based or ordinal comparison rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个派生自类包含基于字符串的比较、 相等性，并考虑到这两个用例和特定于区域性的比较规则的哈希代码操作。An object derived from the class embodies string-based comparison, equality, and hash code operations that take into account both case and culture-specific comparison rules. 可以使用类来创建特定于类型的比较泛型集合中的元素进行排序。You can use the class to create a type-specific comparison to sort the elements in a generic collection. 类，如， ， ，和使用类对于排序目的而言。Classes such as , , , and use the class for sorting purposes. 比较运算，由表示类定义进行区分大小写或不区分大小写，并使用任一词 （区分区域性） 或 （不区分区域性的） 的序号比较规则。A comparison operation that is represented by the class is defined to be either case-sensitive or case-insensitive, and use either word (culture-sensitive) or ordinal (culture-insensitive) comparison rules. 有关 word 和序号比较规则的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about word and ordinal comparison rules, see . ## 实现的属性Implemented Properties 您可能不清楚如何使用由于了矛盾类属性。You might be confused about how to use the class properties because of a seeming contradiction. 类的声明`abstract`(`MustInherit`在 Visual Basic 中)，这意味着其成员可以仅在派生类的对象上调用类。The class is declared `abstract` (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), which means its members can be invoked only on an object of a class derived from the class. 矛盾在于的每个属性类的声明`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，这意味着该属性可以无需首先创建一个派生的类调用。The contradiction is that each property of the class is declared `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), which means the property can be invoked without first creating a derived class. 您可以调用属性直接因为每个属性会实际返回的匿名类派生自实例类。You can call a property directly because each property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class that is derived from the class. 因此，每个属性值的类型是，这不是匿名类的基类的匿名类型类本身。Consequently, the type of each property value is , which is the base class of the anonymous class, not the type of the anonymous class itself. 每个类属性返回支持预定义的用例和比较规则的对象。Each class property returns a object that supports predefined case and comparison rules. ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性和方法的类。The following example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 该示例演示如何将不同对象排序三个版本的拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the current culture.

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the current culture.
A new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的语言相关字符串时，可以使用属性。The returned by the property can be used when strings are linguistically relevant. 例如，如果字符串显示给用户，或者如果字符串是用户交互的结果，应使用区分区域性的字符串比较字符串数据进行排序。For example, if strings are displayed to the user, or if strings are the result of user interaction, culture-sensitive string comparison should be used to order the string data. 当前区域性为对象与当前线程关联。The current culture is the object associated with the current thread. 属性实际返回的匿名类派生自实例类。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. 每次调用属性`get`访问器返回一个新对象，如以下代码所示。Each call to the property `get` accessor returns a new object, as the following code shows. [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/cs/CompareObjects.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/vb/CompareObjects.vb#1)] 若要提高性能，可以存储对象中的本地变量，而不是检索的值属性多次。To improve performance, you can store the object in a local variable rather than retrieve the value of the property multiple times. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性和方法的类。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 该示例演示如何将不同对象排序三个版本的拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets a object that performs case-insensitive string comparisons using the word comparison rules of the current culture.

span.span: Gets a object that performs case-insensitive string comparisons using the word comparison rules of the current culture.
A new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前区域性为对象与当前线程关联。The current culture is the object associated with the current thread. 返回的字符串是与语言相关，但不是其大小写时，可以使用属性。The returned by the property can be used when strings are linguistically relevant but their case is not. 例如，如果字符串显示给用户，但情况是不重要，则区分区域性的应使用不区分大小写的字符串比较字符串数据进行排序。For example, if strings are displayed to the user but case is unimportant, culture-sensitive, case-insensitive string comparison should be used to order the string data. 属性实际返回的匿名类派生自实例类。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. 每次调用属性`get`访问器返回一个新对象，如以下代码所示。Each call to the property `get` accessor returns a new object, as the following code shows. [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/cs/CompareObjects.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/vb/CompareObjects.vb#2)] 若要提高性能，可以存储对象中的本地变量，而不是检索的值属性多次。To improve performance, you can store the object in a local variable rather than retrieve the value of the property multiple times.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是比效率更高方法因为`obj`参数无需取消装箱来执行该操作。The method is more efficient than the method because the `obj` parameter does not have to be unboxed to perform the operation. 方法分配的大小成正比的内存量`obj`若要计算的哈希代码`obj`。The method allocates an amount of memory that is proportional to the size of `obj` to calculate the hash code of `obj`. 在大型字符串的情况下尝试检索哈希代码可能会引发。In the case of large strings, trying to retrieve the hash code can throw an . 相反，您可以使用计算哈希代码时分配固定的内存量的可选算法。Instead, you can use an alternate algorithm that allocates a fixed amount of memory when calculating hash codes. 若要使用此算法时，将添加[< NetFx45_CultureAwareComparerGetHashCode_LongStrings >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx45-cultureawarecomparergethashcode-longstrings-element.md)元素[\<运行时 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)应用程序的配置文件的部分。To use this algorithm, add the [](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx45-cultureawarecomparergethashcode-longstrings-element.md) element to the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of your application's configuration file.

exception.span: Not enough memory is available to allocate the buffer that is required to compute the hash code.

span.span: Not enough memory is available to allocate the buffer that is required to compute the hash code.
is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的属性对字符串进行比较以与语言相关的方式，但它不是适用于任何特定区域性中显示。The returned by the property compares strings in a linguistically relevant manner, but it is not suitable for display in any particular culture. 其主要应用程序是为各个区域性中将是相同的方式的顺序字符串。Its major application is to order strings in a way that will be identical across cultures. 是固定的区域性返回对象属性。The invariant culture is the object returned by the property. 属性实际返回的匿名类派生自实例类。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性和方法的类。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 该示例演示如何将不同对象排序三个版本的拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的属性对字符串进行比较的方式与语言相关的不区分大小写，但它不是适用于任何特定区域性中显示。The returned by the property compares strings in a linguistically relevant manner that ignores case, but it is not suitable for display in any particular culture. 其主要应用程序是为各个区域性中将是相同的方式的顺序字符串。Its major application is to order strings in a way that will be identical across cultures. 是固定的区域性返回对象属性。The invariant culture is the object returned by the property. 属性实际返回的匿名类派生自实例类。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class.

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive ordinal string comparison.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的属性执行与语言无关的简单字节比较。The returned by the property performs a simple byte comparison that is independent of language. 比较字符串的生成以编程方式或比较区分大小写的资源，如密码时，这是最合适。This is most appropriate when comparing strings that are generated programmatically or when comparing case-sensitive resources such as passwords. 属性实际返回的匿名类派生自实例类。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性和方法的类。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 该示例演示如何将不同对象排序三个版本的拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static StringComparer OrdinalIgnoreCase { get; }
.property class System.StringComparer OrdinalIgnoreCase
Public Shared ReadOnly Property OrdinalIgnoreCase As StringComparer
public: static property StringComparer ^ OrdinalIgnoreCase { StringComparer ^ get(); };
member this.OrdinalIgnoreCase : StringComparer

summary.span: Gets a object that performs a case-insensitive ordinal string comparison.

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-insensitive ordinal string comparison.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的属性中要比较为如果它们已转换为大写，则使用固定区域性的约定的字符串视为字符，并执行独立于的简单字节比较语言。The returned by the property treats the characters in the strings to compare as if they were converted to uppercase using the conventions of the invariant culture, and then performs a simple byte comparison that is independent of language. 比较字符串的生成以编程方式或比较不区分大小写的资源，例如路径和文件名时，这是最合适。This is most appropriate when comparing strings that are generated programmatically or when comparing case-insensitive resources such as paths and filenames. 属性实际返回的匿名类派生自实例类。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性和方法的类。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 该示例演示如何将不同对象排序三个版本的拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]
